definition.text: There are a few things you should consider every time you switch branches! Let's go through a quick list bfore you proceed!

paragraphs.text: It may happen that the workspaces or other data structures in the master branch are not compatible with those in the develop branch.
If the current workspace is incompatible with the software in the other branch, the workspace may break upon reloading the app. In such a case, you must load a Plugin Workspace of the new branch.
Even the structure of mined data may have changed!
Always check the README file in the develop branch of the repository for any comments on backward compatibility. Before switching branches, it is always good to back up your work!
